definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cleave(Ar. falah.a cleave; Aram. [[פְּלַח]] (usu.),plah., are till, work, serve [= [[עָבַד]]]);—
cleave open, through, 3 ms. [[יְפַלַּח]] of piercing kidneys Job 16:13, liver Pr 7:23 (both fig.); [[וַיְּפַלַּח אֶל]] 2Ki 4:39 of cutting up (fruit) into pot.
cause to cleave open, 3 fpl. [[יַלְדֵיהֶן תְּפַלַּחְנׇה]] Job 39:3 of animals bringing forth young; rd. perh. [[תְּפַלַּטְנׇה]] (Job 21:10).
